docs.title: Home - Financial Accounting
docs.text: Welcome to the official documentation for the Financial Accounting System, engineered by Tara Tech Ltd. This guide is designed to help you manage your organization's fiscal health with precision. Quick Start learn how to set up your Chart of Accounts and enter your first voucher.

docs.title: overview
docs.text: Welcome to the official documentation for the Financial Accounting System, engineered by Tara Tech Ltd. This guide is designed to help you manage your organization's fiscal health with precision. Quick Start learn how to set up your Chart of Accounts and enter your first voucher.

docs.title: reports
docs.text: Welcome to the official documentation for the Financial Accounting System, engineered by Tara Tech Ltd. This guide is designed to help you manage your organization's fiscal health with precision. Quick Start learn how to set up your Chart of Accounts and enter your first voucher.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: System overview and general features of the Financial Accounting software. Introduction to modules and navigation.

docs.title: 1. Accounting Dashboard
docs.text: Accounting Dashboard overview. Real-time financial monitoring, key performance indicators, and fiscal summaries.

docs.title: 2. Chart of Accounts
docs.text: Chart of Accounts (COA) setup. COA List Entry, Opening Balances, and configuration for account heads.

docs.title: 3. Generate Vouchers
docs.text: Daily Operations: Debit, Credit, Journal, and Fund Transfer Voucher entries. How to generate and manage vouchers.

docs.title: 4. Bank Reconciliation
docs.text: Periodic Tasks: Bank Reconciliation, matching bank statements with internal records, and resolving discrepancies.

docs.title: 5. Income & Expense Voucher
docs.text: Recording income and expense vouchers. Managing daily transactions and categorized spending.

docs.title: Process
docs.text: System processes, Day Close procedures, and Month-End processing workflows.

docs.title: Report
docs.text: Generate Financial Reporting: Trial Balances, P&L Statements, and Balance Sheets in one click.
